sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './main.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBCol } from 'mdbreact'; import Sidebar from './sidebar/sidebar' class Main extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { books:[] } } componentDidMount(){ this.getBooks(); } getBooks = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:4000/books') .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => this.setState({books: res.data})) .catch(err => console.error(err)) } renderBooks = ({list_id, title, edition, isbn, price,book_type,book_condition}) =>
{title} Edition: {edition}, ISBN: {isbn}
  • Book Type: {book_type}
  • Book Condition: {book_condition}
  • Price: ${price}
Contact
render(){ return (
{/*

Bookhub

    Dummy Heading

  • Home
    • Home 1
    • Home 2
    • Home 3
  • About
  • Pages
    • Page 1
    • Page 2
    • Page 3
  • Portfolio
  • Contact
*/} {/* */}
{/*
*/} {this.renderBooks}
); } } export default Main;
